items.content_html: A lightweight, containerized deployment system for frontend projects. Clone a GitHub repo, build it with Bun, and deploy it to an S3-compatible storage, all automated via RabbitMQ and Redis. No vendor lock-in, no unnecessary complexityâ€”just simple, self-hosted deployments
items.title: biohacker0/Hostify: A lightweight, containerized deployment system for frontend projects. Clone a GitHub repo, build it with Bun, and deploy it to an S3-compatible storage, all automated via RabbitMQ and Redis. No vendor lock-in, no unnecessary complexityâ€”just simple, self-hosted deployments
